THREAD ⬇️⬇️⬇️I will chair an @OversightDems Subcommittee on Environment hearing today at 2:00 PM EST focused on #PFAS chemicals. Companies KNEW about their toxic effects - and actively covered up the scientific evidence. https://twitter.com/MariahCBlake/status/1153835956535013379 …

Up to 110 million Americans have been exposed to #PFAS chemicals through drinking water. Exposure to PFAS can cause decreased fertility/birth defects/cancer. 700 people die every year in Orange County due to drug and alcohol overdoses. My bill, the Effective Drug Control Strategy Act, ensures our fight against the addiction crisis is waged strategically and effectively.  https://ocweekly.com/accounting-for-opioids-in-orange-county/ …

.@eastersealshq has been an invaluable community resource for individuals with disabilities. I've co-sponsored 61 pieces of legislation that protect and improve disability rights across the United States, and will continue to advocate for every member of our CA-48 community. pic.twitter.com/NWcyH6AYVf

Thank you to @RepTimBurchett, and several of my colleagues for supporting the Effective Drug Control Strategy Act and ensuring our fight against the addiction crisis is waged strategically and effectively. (4/4)

My bill would direct the @ONDCP to consult with relevant agencies, like @HHSGov, @DHSGov, @TheJusticeDept, to publish online a list of all federal-funded drug control activities and require the @ONDCP to review these activities annually. (3/x)

Lives are being lost at unprecedented rates, and it is clear that our efforts to reduce addiction-related deaths have failed. We need strategic initiatives that WORK and communication between our government agencies to stop this crisis. (2/x) pic.twitter.com/2KeBj4BfGA

This year, Americans will lose close to 70,000 friends, family, and loved ones to drug-related deaths. My bill, the Effective Drug Control Strategy Act, is a small but significant step to improve the effectiveness of our fight against the addiction crisis. (1/x)
